title: Development of a Cyberpedagogy-Based LMS Model: Application of the ADDIE Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device proficiency and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening LMS model development capabilities through real-time online education in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain an LMS development process by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation).
Learners can propose a cyberpedagogy-based LMS design plan utilizing diverse learning resources.
Learners can establish LMS utilization strategies centered on smartphones in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
